info.title: ezRemote Client
info.author: cy33hc
info.description: Remote File Manager for FTP, SMB, WebDAV
info.details: A File Manager application that allows you to connect the Switch to remote FTP, SMB, WebDAV servers to transfer and manage files.

changelog:
v1.13
Updated OnScreen Keyboard to global version which allows all language input

1.12
Add support for browse and download release artifacts from github repos. Under the server just enter the git repo of the homebrew
